aboutpara: A Cloud/DevOps professional focused on designing and managing practical cloud solutions. I leverage automation with Infrastructure as Code (Terraform) and container orchestration (Kubernetes, GKE) to build robust systems. I am passionate about implementing observability and smooth CI/CD pipelines to ensure systems are both efficient and resilient.

resume.description: I build automated, scalable, and secure infrastructure.  I transform processes with Kubernetes, Terraform, and CI/CD tools to deliver reliable systems that drive business success.
